title: Tech Company Funding Concentration in Midwest Data Center Corridor
summary: Multiple tech companies (Google, Microsoft, Amazon) are investing in electrician training programs in IL, IA, OH but the specific training providers and fund distribution are not publicly documented. Need to track where this money actually flows.
innocent_explanations: Tech companies may be working through established JATC programs which have their own reporting
Funding details may be disclosed in corporate sustainability reports not yet indexed
Partnerships may still be in negotiation phase with details to be announced
next_tests: Request details from Google's workforce development program
Check if IL community colleges have announced new electrical programs with tech funding
Monitor IBEW local announcements for new training partnerships

title: Gap Between Federal Funding Announcements and Training Outcomes
summary: DOL and DOE have announced $145M+ in electrical training funding, but industry reports still cite critical electrician shortages. Need to track whether announced funding is translating to actual trained workers.
innocent_explanations: Apprenticeship programs take 4-5 years to produce journeymen, so recent funding hasn't had time to show results
Shortage may be due to retirement wave that exceeds current training capacity regardless of funding
Data center demand growth may be outpacing any realistic training expansion
next_tests: Compare DOL registered apprenticeship completion rates 2020 vs 2024
Request program-level data from major grant recipients
Track IBEW membership growth in data center corridor states

title: Illinois DCEO Grant Recipients Not Fully Disclosed
summary: Illinois DCEO announced $3.1M in electrical training grants but full recipient list and award amounts not published. Standard practice would include disclosure of all awardees.
innocent_explanations: Full disclosure may be published separately from press release
Some grants may still be pending final execution
FOIA request may be needed but information is available upon request
next_tests: Submit FOIA request to DCEO for complete grant recipient list
Check DCEO grants database for electrical/construction training awards
Contact DCEO press office for additional details
